name: BufferMAN | Ludum Dare 40
description:
Hack through the buffer! 

But in the 80s style! Neons and lasers! What else do you need?

BufferMAN is a retro-inspired plataformer prototype with the sights put into puzzle solving and speedrunning. The core mechanincs are simple enough, but mastery will be difficult.

The prototype is in a proof-of-concept stage, but all the elements are there, and if it gets at least a few guys interested, I will continue the game polishing details and making more levels+mechanincs. I love this sutff :)

Feel free to give it a try and a review! I will take everything into account :D
